Title: Requires a consultation prior to the discharge of medically fragile young adults
Summary: Relates to medically fragile young adults and pediatric specialized nursing facilities; allows for such young adults to remain in such facilities from age twenty-one until age thirty-six.
LawCode: Add ยง2830, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to medically fragile young adults and pediatric specialized nursing facilities
